thread.section_title: StockWiseAuto.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StockWiseAuto.com | stockwiseauto.com | 9 of 272
thread.title: Netza

author: Netza
title: Netza
text: The ordering process was simple and the website was easy to navigate. I found stockwiseauto.com to have the best prices online and better than the local auto parts stores. I purchased a set of strut/spring assemblies for a 2003 Nissan Altima. Shipping was about 5 business days. One of the packages arrived damaged while the other was impeccable. I was a bit concerned with the damaged package, but upon inspection I found the strut to be in good condition except that the brake line bracket was bent a bit. It wasn't severe and I was able to massage it back into place. I believe the packaging could have been a little better, but I also believe the shipping company could have been more careful with package. The parts were nearly identical to the OEM parts and I had no issues with fitment or installation. I would recommend stockwiseauto and would shop there again.
